about.title: About Us
about.description: With years of experience in the Saudi Arabian market, we deliver exceptional manpower solutions and contracting services with unwavering commitment to quality and client satisfaction.

items.title: Licensed & Certified
items.description: Fully licensed and certified to operate in Saudi Arabia with all necessary permits and compliance.

items.title: Experienced Team
items.description: Our team brings decades of combined experience in manpower and contracting services.

items.title: Timely Delivery
items.description: We pride ourselves on meeting deadlines and delivering projects on schedule.

items.title: Quality Assurance
items.description: Rigorous quality control processes ensure excellence in every project we undertake.

services.title: Manpower Supply
services.description: Comprehensive workforce solutions tailored to your business needs.

services.title: Recruitment Services
services.description: Professional recruitment and staffing solutions for all industries.

services.title: General Contracting
services.description: Complete construction and contracting services for commercial and residential projects.

services.title: Project Management

services.title: Maintenance Services

services.title: Consulting Services
services.description: Expert consulting for workforce optimization and project planning.

items.question: What services does your company provide?
items.answer: We provide comprehensive manpower supply, recruitment services, general contracting, project management, maintenance services, and consulting. Our services cover all aspects of workforce solutions and construction projects.

items.question: How long does the recruitment process take?
items.answer: The recruitment timeline varies depending on the position and requirements. Typically, we can provide qualified candidates within 2-4 weeks for standard positions. For specialized roles, it may take 4-8 weeks to ensure we find the perfect match.

items.question: Are you licensed to operate in Saudi Arabia?
items.answer: Yes, we are fully licensed and certified to operate in Saudi Arabia. We hold all necessary permits and comply with Saudi labor laws and regulations. Our company is registered with the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development.

items.question: What industries do you serve?
items.answer: We serve a wide range of industries including construction, oil & gas, manufacturing, hospitality, healthcare, retail, and more. Our diverse experience allows us to understand the unique needs of each sector.

items.question: Do you provide workers for short-term projects?
items.answer: Yes, we offer flexible workforce solutions for both short-term and long-term projects. Whether you need workers for a few weeks or several years, we can accommodate your requirements.

items.question: How do you ensure the quality of your workers?
items.answer: We have a rigorous screening and vetting process that includes background checks, skills assessments, and interviews. All our workers are trained and qualified for their respective roles. We also provide ongoing support and quality monitoring.
